product_name: Nike Legend 2.0 Tight Poly Pants - Women's
long_description: The women's Nike Legend 2.0 Tight Poly Pants offer a snug yet comfortable fit and lightweight coverage, so that cool weather never stands in the way of your next workout. Dri-FIT(R) fabric delivers high-tech moisture management to keep you cool and dry; lightweight fabric feels soft and comfortable against your skin. Recycled polyester and spandex fabric hugs your body through hips and thighs, reduces friction and offers a sleek look. Wide waistband lies flat against skin; higher rise in the back for extra coverage when you're bending and stretching. Waistband pocket stores small items such as a key or debit card. The Nike Legend 2.0 Tight Poly Pants offer a next-to-body, athletic fit.
short_description: The women's Nike Legend 2.0 Tight Poly Pants offer a snug yet comfortable fit and lightweight coverage, so that cool weather never stands in the way of your next workout.
